name: Flip Hair Sally
description:
Intergalactic traveller Sally beams herself down to a mystical planet while her family sleeps. She runs free through eerie wonders and broken spaceships -- until rays of light crash down, missing her by a hair. Her parents are about to beam her back up and stop her adventure!

Sally, like all of her people, has a secret -- she can flip her colour and phase through the beams!
